reviews: Worst hotel I’ve stayed at in Mexico. Basically feels like a hospital. Also the fraudulently play Hyatt content on the TV’s to make people think they are part of Hyatt when in fact they are not.   Avoid at all costs and stick to larger chains if possible. At least within Cancun

The place seem nice and all from the outside, but we had too many camels to swallow at this hotel.   Our room had city/seaview. There was a glitch in the frame of the balcony door. We heard loud music until 4 and 5 am every night, and were not able to sleep. We made the staff aware of the situation, but they did nothing to help us. We felt that we were met with a cold shoulder. The service of the staff didn’t reflect the prize we had to pay to stay there. It is very unfortunate, we have had a long flight to get to Cancun from Norway.  There was long waiting lines to get a table for breakfast, and they even ran out of food at 10 am. And there was supposed to be served until 12.  When we were eating breakfast, the staff could come several times and ask us about our room number,

We have very nice experience all over, especially restaurant, which is part of the resort named Las Velas (Italian restaurant) nice and quiet place to enjoy the dinner . Can’t wait to stop by again and visit this beautiful place special. Thanks to Santa Cruz. !

We stayed here for one night thankfully. We paid around $350 for a ocean view, asked for a king, got two doubles, room was old, loud due to the cement hallway, poor air conditioning, the toilet broke, the coffee machine was per junk. The pillows felt like soft rocks. The desk staff was unfriendly and tried to charge us extra. The margarita was the worst I’ve had.

Do not stay here! I'm so sorry and I hate leaving a bad review.  My boyfriend and I travel a lot and we are not fussy about where we stay. We are definitely ok with the bare minimum but this was worse than we expected.  We liked the price and decided it couldn't be that bad, but it is bad...  The room is good! nothing wrong with the room and the resort, but it's the food and drinks. The food is so so bland, we couldn't eat here. We struggled to find food outside of the resort as well but the food here was very bad. Kinda like hospital food.  The drinks are made with watered-down bottles of alcohol.  I think I (a small woman) had maybe 10-15 drinks one day by the beach in the hopes to feel a buzz but nothing. They make you pay extra for unopened alcohol like bottled beer.  It's a

The staff at Krystal are so nice and go above and beyond. Erick, Paula, Victoria, Venus and Linda were the absolute best!! Made our trip so memorable  The resort is quiet, no alcohol served after 11pm, great location to walk to the bars

Jose was more than kind and helpful during my stay. I appreciate all of his help and service during my stay!!! :) He was productive and helped us without us even asking. This is the kind of service I really appreciate!!! GRACIAS JOSE

This is not 4 star! It's barely a 3. Pictures are not current. First problem was at check in. 5 people checking in to 2 rooms. My husband and my daughter and I checked into our room which had only one bed. I called the front desk who said we were given an upgrade to ocean view which is only one bed. I said thanks but we are 3 people, we cannot sleep in 1 bed. He said he could move us back to garden view but we have 2 rooms and I did not want to move from the rest of my family. He was super rude. They decided to bring us another bed. The bed came with only a sheet, no blanket and no pillow. Another call to front desk.  The pool is disgusting. It's filthy and there are so many tiles missing, a light was loose and stairs to get in are slanted. I watched several people struggle to

Excellent service and food was delicious. I came with a group of 14 people and there were no complications. Staffs were very friendly and quick with service. There’s a lot on the menu to choose from for dinner

Pros: Excellent location. Very close to the street where Coco Bongo and all the other clubs are. Private beach and pool. Daily entertainment and music by the pool. Very clean and nice rooms. Daily room service. I don’t understand how this hotel is only a 3 star hotel because it feels like it is a 5 star hotel.   Cons: a few of the staff in the reception gave us wrong information. For instance one person wrote wrong room number on the key card so the key obviously didn’t work so I had to go back to the reception and someone else told me the right room number.

Nicer than expected!  We were on the beach side and had awesome views of the ocean.  The place was clean with friendly staff.  Housekeeping came daily even!  A lot of the reviews I read ahead of time were negative but we were very happy we were here.  Music was loud 1 night from the Hotel Zone but otherwise it wasn’t an issue.  Could walk to any eatery.

Special Thanks to Victoria that mades us feel welcomed everytime we went to her bar Henri at the pool bar & Erick.  Very friendly staff The aquamarina restaurant is good, not much variety but so far so good. The egg station for breakfast is very good.  Wish the buffet was a little more diversified.

My husband and I got there for our honeymoon and were given a room with 2 double twin beds. We had booked a room with a king-size bed but were told that "beds are not guaranteed" and had to sleep in that room for the first night, despite informing the front desk that we were on our honeymoon and had booked a different room.  Every time we went to the front desk, we had to wait at least 10 minutes (and sometimes 15 or 20) just to see someone at the front desk.  Someone from housekeeping took my hair towel (which looked very different from any of the hotel's towels) and we had to spend about two hours playing phone tag with the receptionist at the front desk to eventually get housekeeping to return the towel. It took 2 days.  Finally, we checked out a day early (at 7am that

We stayed one night at the Krystal due to Sunwing flight delay. This hotel is definitely not worth a 4 star. Rooms are very basic at best, bed is uncomfortable, it is quite noisy and run down. Drinks are sub par. Only positive point is friendly staff.

Saisha the E-concierge Was the sweetest  & most efficient staff member, even before our arrival  she made sure that everything was absolutely perfect, during our stay she was always attentive and helpful, her service really is “top notch” She would anticipate our needs before us. Thank you Krystal Cancun team for the most memorable and amazing family vacations of our lifes!!! We can wait to come back

Me and my girlfriend sang at the karaoke night with Mari, Ale, and Tayron. The night was amazing and they were so much fun.   Linda at the snack bar was an incredible help by recommending the best fish tacos for lunch   Abi, OrFa, and Brisa also made the stay so much better and it was an absolutely incredible experience

Did a zumba class with Tyrone, Mari and Alessandro. All of them had very good energy and my girlfriend and I had a lot of fun doing it. The difficulty was at a great level so all of us had a chance of partipating. Allesandro was funny and we all had a very good time.  I would do it again!

First the good points: Mario Gil was an excellent waiter.  Great people skills!  Perfect example of what a waiter should be. Karina was nice as well as Angeles  Now for the no so good points: We stayed Krystal Hotel in 2017 and at this visit we saw quite a few changes.  This food quality has changed.  We have pictures from 2017  of steaks and other meals from the Italian restaurant that are no longer on the menu.  The fish tacos were still good.  The Mediterranean restaurant had a few nice choices.  We had to ask for water bottles to replaced every day.  That is something that should have been automatically done on a daily basis.  The towels when you first arrive in your room are white with crested emblems.   The nice day the housekeeper replaced the towels with dingy, frayed

Took my wife for dinner we had the hibachi. The chef was really friendly and knows his stuff food was really good highly recommend it 5 star for sure. Come and check them out 🔥💯🔥💯🔥💯🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥💯💯💯💯💯💯💯💯💯💯💯💯💯🔥💯🔥💯🔥💯🔥💯💯🔥💯💯🔥💯💯💯💯💯💯💯🔥🔥💯💯🔥🔥

This restaurant was stunning! It looked directly onto the beach and ocean, it was perfect for our birthday celebration meal. The food was wonderful and the service was also exceptional! Justo was so attentive and was super lovely.  I would highly recommend dining here!!

I will post a longer review once back from this "Resort".  If considering this place as an all inclusive then stop now!!!  If already booked then seriously consider looking at changing.  Lots of things aren't as advertised.

I would stay away from this place I ended up getting sick there. I think the good reviews on here are people getting confused with the grand crystal altitude resort which is really good but this place is an absolute dive and it is a scam really they want money for everything they want money for water they want money for Smirnoff alcohol. It took about 30 minutes to get checked into a room. The front desk is a slow as can be there was really nothing good about this hotel. I would stay away go somewhere better.

Our stay at Krystal Cancun was amazing! The best part was Victoria at the lobby bar! She was so kind and fun! She also makes the best drinks at the resort! We will come back just to see her! Thank you so much Victoria for making our vacation amazing!

Very large hotel located on the beach. Poor rooms which can be upgraded at checking in. the location is excellent around the corner from the town center. All the restaurants and night life is a 5-minute walk.

Nice location at the beach. Very friendly hotel personal. Especially Marco the receptionist was great and made us feel really welcome. We even were allowed to check in 2 hours early into the rooms. Would definitely come again.

The staff is great but the food is OK. The room was less then desired, the ceiling in the shower was showing signs of leaking, the drain in the shower had a nasty smell, the toilet flushed half the time, the faucets were leaking, the room was in need of major updating. The hallways were not clean and plants showing signs of mold and half dead. We paid a lot of money for our 2 week stay, even if we advised them of the problems, nothing was done. Will definitely not go there again. Would be a great beech if it wasn't so dirty 😔

Staff is great but the food was awful.  No ham bacon or sausage for breakfast, buffet was anything they didn't use the night before like chicken stew, nuggets and fries.  Some days they had fruit, some days not, had to ask for toast.  ate cold cereal for 14 days and I'm not a picky eater.  no smoke detector in our room (1704) called the front desk and they said "well you can't smoke in the room anyways" we are non smokers and they did nothing about getting us a smoke detector.  I wouldn't go back.  And never mind just asking your room number for meals, you needed your bracelet number too like an inmate.

We had an amazing 4 night getaway! To date, one of our favorite vacations.  Our room in Tower A with an Oceanview was great.  Everything was clean, well appointed, and the bed was very comfortable.  We did the all-inclusive plan, and barring a few "special menu" options, it was just that.  One of the best Oceanviews we've ever had, the staff was fabulous and the food was really good!   Public restrooms and common areas were clean.  Our only thing was that the lobby bar closed at 10:50pm, not a second later, with no last call.  It could use a little ambiance (lower lighting, background music, etc.);  it was almost too modern/cold.  Unless you want to go to the strip, there's nowhere to go after the bar closes.  They could also use a little place to get a coffee outside of the

This hotel is amazing. Very friendly and helpful staff, location on the beach is perfect. Breakfast buffet, snack shack and ala carte restaurants all had really good food. Drinks were to notch. Ocean view room is worth every penny, view is Incredible. I don't understand any of these negative reviews, this hotel has exceeded our expectations, we will be back for sure. Currently sitting in a Bali bed on the beach, feels like paradise.

I just checked into this resort and the rooms are so misleading online. I’ve paid for Krystal club which is the highest of the room categories. Upon entry, it’s smells like mould, the door you have to slam the close, the bathroom is dated, there are no hand towels or face cloths. Bare minimum amenities in the bathroom.  No slippers to wear even, all basic amenities. It’s bare bones basic and old. I’m here for the week and already regretting booking this place. I tried emailing them earlier this week and never got a response either.

Very good beach and water, that was the high light , everything else was very subpar we were originally booked in the "B" tower in which the shower water did not work almost at all for the first 4 days, one of the elevators was always out of service so wait times were always excessive, the food in the buffets is very boring and bland and considering the amount to stay at this property the food is very underwhelming, you have to ask the staff for everything such as basic things like milk, ketchup, butter, syrup, bacon, or a piece of beef, so if people don't know the language they won't get anything,  you have to wait a long time to get alcoholic drinks and even though tips are included in the price the bar tenders will almost ignore you if you don't tip them all the time, the

Justo at Las Velas restaurant was amazing first class service!!!!!!!! He did at an amazing job servicing our table and my friends truly enjoyed the atmosphere and justos service.  We will definitely be visiting again !

Great location on the beach.  We started out with a room on the parking lot side of the building, but at our request, moved to the beach side on 3rd day when a room became available.  It can be noisy at night during Spring break, however, the beauty of the beach and the great swimming available at the beach make up for this.  Food at the main restaurant (buffet) is OK.  Lots of restaurants and bars nearby.

I stayed at the Krystal Cancun for a work conference held at at the Cancun Center.  The beach area and weather were amazing Mid-March and although the Hotel was nicely situated to the conference center, everything else was not great.  I don't typically write negative reviews but I felt the need to write one for this hotel.  The rooms were old, with hard to find/reach outlets. The buttons on the safe in the room barely worked.  The sliding door to the balcony did not lock (hazard for those with children).  The bathroom fixtures were rusting and one morning we had water leaking from the ceiling panels in the bathroom (probably from the room above).  I was there during peak spring break time and it was VERY LOUD at all hours of the day / night since the hotel is next to the big

Justo and Haido were incredible tonight. We had a wonderful evening filled with great food, laughter, and spectacular service. Our stay here has been exceptional and was only made that much more enjoyable tonight.

We ate at the seafood restaurant for lunch and we had Zulema as our server. She is so incredibly welcoming and always wants to help. The staff here is all so kind. She had great recommendations for the menu options and made our experience fantastic!! ❤️❤️

I stayed at this resort and was not impress with the service or food. The beach and water was lovely but the resort was not well organize as we didn't get our daily allotment of bottle water. We would always have to call the front desk to get them. When we checked in we didn't receive a welcome brochure informing us about the locale or what to expect from the resort.   We would do the buffet as we were doing the all inclusive. The buffet was never hot. It was either lukewarm or cold.  The only hot food was from either the omelet bar in the morning or the grill at night. We notice that some restaurant staff was not food safe in handling meat using the same utensil to give to guest there food after using them for raw meat.  The rooms are a little old as we notice mold in the

We've been to Cancun 14 times, and stayed all over the strip. This hotel was by and far the WORST. Horrible customer service from everyone except save a few of the food service staff.  First time coming to Cancun with our kids, and we got a family suite in tower B, ocean view. Come to find out no hot water the first morning we were there. We spoke to the front desk staff, they offered to fix it, but it wasn't fixed. So, then they moved us down one floor. Still no hot water. Ended up talking to a couple who was just down from us on our original floor, they said the same thing, no hot water. Luany from the front desk offered us another family room, tower B still, street view but 2nd floor and let us check first to make sure the water worked, which it didn't. So, they told us there

Great place to vacation, very nice people with smiling faces and great attitudes. Juan Flores the beach and cabana attendant is amazing. Mario Gil and Karina at Las Velas Restaurant gave us incredible and attention to detail. Highly recommend coming here.

What a great experience we had at La Velas restaurant in Krystal Cancun hotel. Waiter Mario Gil and receptionist Karina went out of their way to make our experience special! Highly recommended! Juan Flores, beach attendant on the beach, the best!

A member of the staff provided us a promotional event and lured us an hour from our hotel just to intimidate us with being left stranded until other excursions were purchased through the company. Management was notified and it was not shocking to them but every day practice for this company.

The location is great ! Easily within walking distance to many clubs, restaurants, shopping, Isla Mujeres Ferry, and literally a stones throw from the beach. The downside is, the proximity to the clubs nextdoor makes the noise level UNBELEIVABLY LOUD !!! Without exaggeration, it's like you are vacationing inside the club itself, it is super super loud !!!  And it goes well into the late hours of the evening, making sleeping next to impossible when its going, which was 4 out of the 7 days we were there.   The hotel facility itself thou is beautiful, the pool is huge and includes bridges, tunnels & a water fall. The restaurants were good and did not disappoint,  including the buffets . The staff were really really good. Very polite, helpful and attentive. If you're not housed in

Avoid at all costs. It's a "no man's land" hotel where both employees and guests suffer from the owners neglect. Out of 3 nights: in the 1st our daughter got eaten by bedbugs, on the 2nd a massive leak in our room broke out at dawn and made the toilet unusable and on the 3rd they decided to use a chainsaw at 2am for reparation work. Absolute disaster.

It was amazing. We were two girls and we had an amazing time. It felt very safe and relaxing! Having the beach and pools right in front of us was a plus. Everything was nearby and we were able to book activities in the hotel as well.

Great friendly service from justo.  Food was amazing and great quality. The View was calming and ambient. I have no complaints. I had a wonderful time. I would definitely recommend for good Italian food.

I’m not the usual type to take the time to review but Maria (entertainment staff) Miguel, Emmanuel and Fernando were absolutely exceptional with the service, they always checked up on us. Only thing was the food which was really bland with no flavour but the Las Velas restaurant was really good.

My dude Daniel makes a pork chop so good it will make you wanna slap your ancestors for never treating a cut of meat right... Dude is an absolute wizard with that pork chop, I'm mad at my momma for never loving me enough to make a pork chop this slamming.... My brother agrees

Las Velas was amazing!! Justo our waiter was the best. Food was delicious with great views of the beach. Balman the manag3r was also great.  He Came around and personally spoke to patrons. Definitely would come again!!

they lie say you booke in cheaper part and want you to pay for upgrade and blame travel agent i booked through thier website,,foods 2 star rating ,,told us we cant get into restaurant for dinner unless u reserve  at 9 am ,,only 4 restraunts not 8 ,,,they allow people to come from hotel im city to use beach wich turns into every body and kids and speakers with 20 different music playing on beach ,,most of hotel is run down ,,service is poor if ur used to 4-5 star do not book here ,,,theres no real adults only area and way to many people who actualy are staying im city and just come to use hotel and beach

LOVE LOVE LOVE the Krystal Cancun.  Julio is the best.  Alberto, Cruz, Christbol are the best ever!  Rooms are clean.  Love the balcony for morning coffee that overlooks the Caribbean.  Location is perfect.  Within walking distance to flea markets, stores, etc.

The Hotel is Okay, we stayed in the Krystal Club room, the beds were not comfortable, and you can't control the AC (just Low,Midium,high) the first night we were freezing in the room, the beds did not have a blanket just a Thin bed sheet, and I notice some mold in the curtains from the Balcony, the weather is so humid. We liked the Aquamarina Restaurant, Cristobal was so nice to us always sadly we were seated not always where he was and Other Weters  were in change of our Table and they didn't do a Great job, we Booker the Italian Restaurant "Las velas" we order the famosas "hand made pizza" but seemed the lady that Cooker the pizza wasn't there yet and they Gave us a very low quality pizza (literally was a Frozen pizza) the waiters there were RUDE!! And not nice, barely explain

Las Velas in Krystal Cancun was great! Love the atmosphere and our waiter Cruz! He was attentive and helpful…. He made sure our needs and wants were met! I have no complaints…. I truly enjoyed the service and food… it was tasteful! Will visit again one day!
Justo Balam at Las Velas was amazing! He was very attentive, kind, professional, and we enjoyed our meal and his service very much! Be sure to visit him if you’re at Krystal Hotel in Cancun!

hotel is excellent and very reasonable compared with others in the hotel zone. the plus is the sea wall at the end of the beach that provides a protected swimming ng area. the restaurants are great. the Las Velas is one of the best Italian around, all hand made and superb pastas and especially tiramisu. see head waiter Balam and  waiter Justo they will make your evening the best. just have light snacks during the day to leave room for the food and wine. 👍😎

2 rooms I had booked were canceled and I was not notified till I got there.  The hotel staff was the least helpful, except for Pedro. They had an emergency that forced them to not allow more rooms to be booked. However, after we arrived they did give other people rooms after we had gotten there first. I do not recommend. I found myself booking somewhere else the day of.  0 out of 5 stars.

We've been to cancun and riveria maya area for the past 15 years.  Decided to try something new and discovered one of the worst all inclusive hotel ever. Small restaurants,  mediocre food,  and they don't know the meaning of all-inclusive.  The only thing that is all-inclusive at the snack bar is the water.  Even the soda is not included.  ridiculous.  The pictures you see on the beach where they have about 20 umbrellas - thats it -the other 100 guest are SOL cuz thats all there is.   We were hopeful but seems the good reviews are FAKE.

We will never be coming back and we will actively tell friends and family to avoid this place. I don't know where to start so might as well start at the beginning. For such a big hotel the check in process is tediously slow, even more frustrating when you have to line up 4 times (each time taking over 20 minutes). First time the room wasn't ready, second time thank gosh room was ready, third time the wrists band wouldn't open our door and fourth time was after being very rudely told that we had no reservation for dinner so couldn't eat and to "go away and bother reception" on how to reserve a place to eat. Turns out there was an email that explained it but I couldn't access until one nice employee in lobby explained how to access internet as none had told me and no information

Very nice hotel. All the staff were very friendly. The property was very clean and organized. Beaches and pools were nice and well-maintained.   Las Velas restaurant had delicious food and great service. Justo and Baloim were great hosts and servers at Las Velas.

Khris Jones was our waiter at Sutra. He was so attentive, knowledgeable and so nice! He really made us feel valued. When we go back, we will look forward to seeing "Jones" again! He made our trip to Temptation memorable.

If you go to Temptation Cancun, make sure you visit Jones at Sutra. He makes the dining experience over the top.  Second year we were fortunate enough to have him wait our table.  Great knowledge and great service.  Top Notch!!!

Always an awesome time. We meet new and awesome people every time, both guests and staff. Jones from the restaurant Sutra was amazing. We ate there 3 times this year just to see him and have a great experience. Looking forward to our next trip!

We recently returned from our 4th trip. The staff and the service provided are exceptional. Beyond that, the atmosphere is great and it’s easy to meet new people. We love going back and reconnecting with the staff and the playmakers who make the trip so enjoyable. Although there have been quite a few changes, it’s always so much fun to meet the new playmakers as well as reconnect with the tenured ones. In particular, Joaquin, vale, Alejandra, kitty kat, guido and Beto.

Going to this adult resort was a unique experience but a lot of fun. Our favorite part was going to the restaurant, Sutra, to see Jones for dinner multiple times during our visit. He truly spoiled us for our honeymoon. I only gave 4 stars because the drinks could be hit or miss out by the pool and our experience at the restaurant, She, was iffy as well. We will definitely be back again!

Always an amazing time at temptations! We celebrated my boyfriends birthday, and Lefranc gave me several different options to help make my bfs day special! This was our third time coming to temptations. Thanks all!

Temptation is so much fun. It's a party atmosphere 24/7. High energy, fun people, WONDERFUL staff, the rooms are crazy! Wild colors, eccentric style. The restaurants are to die for. Teppanyaki, some of the best steak I've had, intimate dinner and show, great seafood. I could go on and on.

We can't get enough of Temptation!!!!  This was our 13th trip and we continue to be greeted like we are family.  From check in where everybody remembers your name to wait staff who always know what you like, bartenders who start making your drink as soon as you make eye contact, hugs from playmakers and returning guests who are as happy to see you as you are to be there.  Shout out to Christian, our amazing butler and Jones our amazing waiter at Sutra.  We just let him order for us and are never disappointed.  Thank you to Mike and Lily who took super great care of us at the pool.  We are Premier members and although we have some issues with how things continually change with some of the member perks we have zero complaints about the resort itself.  I would suggest if you

I love this resort! It's been far too long! For those of us who know about this place, we know! Privacy and fun for all with no worries no matter where you are. Very respectful crowds whenever I come. Had a great butler, Andres. He did a phenomenal job during our trip. On his days off, he made sure that we all were well taken care of. Can't wait to come back!

THE ULTIMATE ADULT PLAYGROUND!!  We’ve been here twice now and are going back in 4 weeks. This place is truly something special! If you want to live free and have the time of your life, with no judgment, regardless if you are in the life style or not, this is it!  The playmakers are what makes this place! The biggest shout out to Sexy papi he’s one of the main guys who runs the pool games during the day and night time shows! He goes above and beyond making sure everyone is having the best time! We have really enjoyed spending time with this group of staff members while we’re on our vacation. Kitty Kat, pretty boy, guideo, sebas, are all such a good time and we still keep in touch with them. I encourage you to look into the theme nights so you can dress up.  We are looking

Where do I start?  This is obviously the most fun hotel and place ever! We started going 5 years ago and only covid has stopped our 2x times a year visit. The most important reason why is the atmosphere and the people that work there. The playmakers are the most incredible people on this planet. I don’t know how they keep the energy up every single day, but they do. The first 3 trips included “sexy papi”. The best playmaker in all 7 trips! He was so fun! So funny!  My husband and I talked about him every trip when we left until he was not there anymore. While the resort was still amazing, we missed his energy. Fast forward to our 7th trip this April. Guess who was back…..sexy papi!  Seriously, so much fun!  Wish we could thank him more but just made the trip more enjoyable. The

Trip #6 to Temptation and once again, we were not disappointed.  From the warm greeting at the front door to dining and entertainment, we always feel welcomed "back home".  Special shout out to Adrian who is quick to ensure all of our personal items are secured and safely transported to our room.  Once again, Christian was a fantastic butler who made sure all of our needs were covered.  Paul made sure our room was in tip-top shape and made the cutest towel dinosaur for my wife.   The entire team at Sea Flirt ensured we had many wonderful dining experiences (with a special thank you to Candelario and Sweet).  Karla and Edgar did an amazing job as always at Caffeine (whether it were an early morning latte or a late evening espresso).  Luigi at the sexy pool bar always great with

Reyes who works in the Rain restaurant has great customer service.  He greeted us every morning and made sure we had everything we needed including mimosas to start the day. His conversations were a good start to each day.

"Welcome home!"  Those are the first words you hear when you get to Temptation and they couldn't be more apropos.  Every visit feels like I'm going to a family reunion I actually want to attend! The sun is shining, the food is good and plentiful, my room is clean, the bed is super comfortable,  and your 'relatives' are fun and friendly.  The stars of this resort are the staff.  It is an understatement to say that they are kind, helpful, hard working and inviting.   I didn't have a poor experience with any member of staff, but I do want to give special mention to a few standouts.  My butler Lefranc checked in with me via Whatsapp each day with a "good morning" message.  He took care of all my needs quickly, efficiently and with a smile.  The bartenders at Bash ( the evening party

We had a great time once again! Shoutout to:  Kevin - breakfast buffet Toño - premier bar Hector - Sutra Sinue - Sutra Reyes - breakfast buffet  Jones - Sutra Mike - towel service Francisco “cookies” - breakfast buffet Francisco - housekeeping  Liz - skybar Wendy - skybar Erick - coffee Alfredo - bellhop  These staff members make the trip amazing!

I am in awe at how amazing the staff was! Ricky for starters! He was friendly, professional, multilingual and an amazing security guard who was able to do his job without a sweat! I always felt safe with him around.....like I knew him for ages! He's a keeper and a forever friend for sure! Love you! Francesca

Just got back from my third trip…. met so many friends from previous trips, and made many new ones!!! This place is a total vibe… laughing, nonstop, the best adult games I’ve ever seen and even better theme nights and shows! I absolutely loved Ali our server at the steakhouse so much that we went back three out of seven nights just for her. Hands-down, best birthday of my life! Made so by each and every beautiful playmaker! Too many to just mention one. Andy Candy is the sexiest and sweetest chica I’ve met in a while and I loved dancing with her. I was pulled out of my comfort zone in the best way possible by Pretty boy, Will, Beto, Joaquin, Sebastian and Guido. I never thought I would be involved in one of the games let alone four of them …They all have amazing energy, are

Best experience in Cancun so far. Party is ongoing, food is great (shout out to Carlos at Rain for taking care of us everytime we went :)), the staff is amazing.  The people who go are so much fun. I can’t wait to go back again!

Best place to go and have fun! Staff are phenomenal. Shout out to Lucio for great service at breakfast and lunch, always hustling and on top of it. Playmakers keep the vibe going all day and night. J.J,  Sabastian, Allison, Alejandra, Will and any I missed! Thank you

Temptation never let's us down.. from day one JJ and his playmakers try to help everyone have a good time. If you don't its your fault. Join the party, Sabastion, Will, Alejandra make it fun for everyone.  Security keeps busy stopping the phones and the bartenders Garry and all. Lucio is an amazing server every year he always takes care of us.

Absolute best hotel! The atmosphere can’t be beat. We loved all the playmakers, bartenders and wait staff!! The playmakers Joaquin, Guido and Will made everything that much better! We’re already planning our next trip back!

Something to say about this place is that, it is an amazing place to stay, you will experience the Real Playground for Adults, restaurants, bars, rooms, service, the staff, food, things to do, everything in one place, Juan the Butler made it so easy for us this time, taking care of our dinner reservations and sending us what is happening during the day with the activities, until the next time...

Had the best time at temptation the staff are amazing. The play makers really were great fun loved every one of them but my favourite was sexy papi lol. David C the waiter was the best we ever had. I would highly recommended if you want a fun filled party vacation. The only complaint I have would be Kenya the woman who took dinner reservations wasn't very nice and actually came across rude! All in all I loved the place and will definitely be back.

In Temptation is where you will have your best vacation ever, we were celebrating my wife's birthday and it was amazing, Juan our butler made such a nice decoration for her in our room, she was clueless, until we got to our room, even when I knew this will happen I was surprised, thank you very much my friend, next time we visit Temptation for sure we will request you as our butler, this hotel is a must if you are looking for fun.

We had so much fun! The staff was incredible, the theme nights were fun, the food was very good and the overall experience waz amazing! Ee highly recommend this resort.  A few of the staff that went out of their way to ensure we had a great time were: Ivan Silva (butler), Mike (pool butler), Alejandra (playmaker), Alejandro (Restaurant Manager) and Diego (bartender)

Look this was the WORSE stay ever. I booked for my birthday. They try to rack up fees and tried to charge me $1400 for a tv they broke! They kept giving me the run around. This place is like a nasty cheap motel and it is not that clean. The parties are not that great and they just serve burgers at everything. Do not recommend. Just stay away! It’s parties day and night and if you need even a moment of peace do not stay here.  Forgot to add food was left outside our door daily and cups at bar are dirty

Had an amazing time during our latest trip! The facility is in immaculate shape! Rooms were nice, clean, and cool! Our butler Andres is awesome! Treated us like a King and Queen. Also have to give a shout out to Angie and Dana for the great message along with Gabriel and Gustavo at the breakfast buffet! We will definitely be back soon.

We love going here. It is not only a vacation for us but like seeing family! They really take good care of us when we are there. From our wonderful butler Christian who helps with our every need. From making reservations at the restaurants for us and even helped when we had an issue with our AC. To Lillian our wonderful poolside help who is always there with a smile. To Gerry and his team of bar attenders at the premier bar, Who are always so attentive, and make the best drinks! And Jj, he is great with the entertainment, and we always love seeing him. We can’t wait to back in November!!

The wife and I go to Temptation every year and are never disappointed. The staff are top notch, especially in the premier office. They always go out of their way for you, especially Jose, who is and was our butler every time we visit. He always greets you with a smile and the professionalism of a hospitality specialist. He is a joy to have as our butler and friend.

Amazing as always!!! Thanks to LeFranc, our stay is always amazing and the best vacation ever. Best butler ever LeFranc! The theme night are so much fun and entertaining, dress up it’s worth it! At the Bash tower parties make sure to get Alexa as your server, she is amazing and keeps your drinks full, great service. Party resort you can’t just go to one time, you will be back!

The resort was amazing. Our butler Dario was the absolute best he took care of everything for us. It was by far the best vacation we have taken. It was non stop fun from the time we woke up till we went to bed.

We have been to Temptations 6 times, and hope to go back again later this year.  The facilities are pristine, and staff works very hard to make your stay great.   Ivan was our butler, and he checked in often to see if we needed something.    Ivan had great customer service skills.    We also has fabulous massages in the spa.  Thank you Angie.    One of best ever massages.    You can’t go wrong by staying at Temptations.

Temptation Cancun was a blast.  Everything was great.  It’s a fun place.  I want to say a special thanks to Wendy she is/was great.  She’s a waitress up at sky 3.5 I believe is what it’s called.  Thank you Wendy 💕.. But I must say.. our Butler his name is Darío.  He was the best.  He made all of our dinner reservations.  No getting up early to hang around to stand in the reservation lines.  He kept us updated on all activities.  We never missed a beat, and we surely would have.  If you see this Dario thanks for making our stay at temptations a care free experience.

This hotel never disappoints, it has everything, excellent restaurants, excellent entertainment, the shows at night are great, beautiful beach, the staff definitely is an asset, the service provided by our butler Juan was so professional all the time, we will be back soon for another great stay, thank you Temptation.

Every time we come to Temptation is excited, is excellent, is an adventure, we made new friends, we saw old ones, we met a new butler called Juan which was very professional and helpful, we were away from the cold which was amazing, to feel the sun burning our skin is wonderful, we tried She and was sexy, Sutra with lots of delicious options, we are planning already our next visit.

We stayed at Temptation,  which was another amazing stay!! We love this place, our butler Juan did a great job, the restaurants were amazing, pools are great, the view from our balcony was amazing, if you are looking for a great place to stay, come to Temptation, you won't regret it!!

Lily poolside was absolutely attentive and personable.  She made our trip memorable and we felt very pampered by her.   That girl needs a raise :).  Thank you for everything Lily!  We look forward to returning and seeing all of the amazing staff especially Lily! Thank you

Had a fabulous stay at Temptation Cancun - the food, the service the amenities are amazing.  Lily is the best at the pool.  She always anticipated our needs and provided incredible service day in and day out.  Thanks for making our stay so special Lily!

It was so great to go visit for our third time.  Such a treat to see familiar faces. The staff really make the trip. Lovely seeing Lilly every morning. She always has my back with chair set up for the day

We stayed at the Tower, and definitely was the best decision, the rooms was spacious, the view was amazing, very comfortable, our Butler was Juan, he took care of us very well, we want him as our butler in our next visit, if you stay at Temptation, stay at the Tower.

I loved everything about Temptation Cancun. But the staff were by far my fav and that’s saying a lot! One playmaker in general really stood above the rest!! Joaquin Aka Sexy Papi was incredible. He was kind, so fun and really kept the energy upbeat. Can’t wait to go back and see one of our fav people.

The staff is very friendly they make sure everyone is well taken care of. Lili, Mike and our waiter Jesus were very attentive once at our cabana. They made my bday trip the best. Yami brought us hookah to the cabana.

I had the best experience!!!!!! Lili and Mike had great customer service !!!!!  They kept the margaritas and tequila shots coming!!!!  They were super informative with parties, excursions and restaurant info.

Lili and Mike helped us get a cabana for the birthday girl. Lots of tequila! We had a great time. The foam party was so much fun and the music was versatile. Would definitely recommend getting a cabana with the back on it instead of just pillows.

We are members at the resort and every time we go, Francisco and Kevin in the buffet are the real mvps when it comes to the food.  Champaign papi (Joaquin), pretty boy (Enrique) and Alejandra are all the best play makers!!! They make sure that the day parties and the night parties are always a great time.  Everyone is always so great and that’s why this is really the only place we travel.

Every time we stay here, it just gets better and better!! We are already booking our next trip! Can't wait to be back at our home away from home at Temptation Resort!  I do have to give a shout out to our guy Israel in the Rain Restaurant. He took care of us like we have never seen before. He is super fun, very attentive, and just an all around amazing guy! He went above and beyond for everyone in that restaurant. We weren't even seated in his section, but he gladly brought us drinks and silverware when we asked him because we couldn't find our waiter at all.   Keep up the great work Temptation Resort! We will be back very very soon!!

If you've never been, it's time to book the trip! It's the best time in Cancun, especially if you get LeFranc as your butler or Lillie for concierge. They both always make us feel so welcome and take great care to ensure we have a wonderful vacation.

Beware when cancelling a reservation made on the hotel website as they don’t warn you that your refund will take 30-40 working days ! This is an unreasonable amount of time in my opinion and completely out of line with other travel experiences

Enrique at Score Bar was AMAZING!!! This dude is the best. Highly recommend. He was quick, fun, and made the best drinks in the whole resort. Everyone needs to come by and see this guy!! Most fun I’ve had in awhile!

Our room was nice, spacious and chic. The food was ok. Not much of a variety for lunch or breakfast. Our butler “mayordomo” Daniel, made our experience very enjoyable and stress free. He made a reservation for us at the restaurant “She” and he checked in on us during our stay. He was polite, attentive and helpful from arrival to departure!  We highly recommend him!  It seemed like capacity was around 30% and this led to evening events that were lackluster. The resort is 1.5 hours from the airport and this requires an additional expense. Perhaps there can be shared transportation in the future when there is higher occupancy.  The best part was their staff!!  Very welcoming.

Once again, a great experience, excellent entertainment for adults.  thank you to the group of entertainment the great Andy candy and especially to Adali the buffet cook for always stepping out and the will to go above and beyond. Gracias Adlai por siempre consentirnos.

If you are looking for fun, go somewhere else, but if you are looking for REAL ADULT FUN, then this is the place, when you are here the last thing you want to do is leave this place, their restaurants always have something to offer you, entertainment is always great, Juan the Butler provided excellent service, I recommend you to ask for him, you won't regret it, we will be back pretty soon, thank you guys.

There was two fights just outside of our room, if that didn’t happen it will be a best experience, but I couldn’t even sleep most of the days there, super load at 3-4am, my wife got a panic attack while the fighting was happening since it was some man hitting a women there, we didn’t see their faces but we can hear everything very clear from inside our room

There is no place like Temptation!  Starts with the people!  Days at the sexy pool are one of a kind.  If you get the chance to have Jhandi serve you, do it!  Whatever you need, he gets it done with the biggest smile. The new playmakers are very good!  Lots of turnover the last 6 months, but the new crew is so friendly!  There is no one like Alejandra! She is spectacular and the sweetest girl on the planet!!  The new head playmaker, Sexy Papi, it too damn funny. Does a great job on the mic and keeps the day going. Parties were outstanding, weather was perfect!  The ultimate playground for grownups.

Where to begin? Property is more like a 2-3 star. Food was awful. We ate off site a couple times. Necklace missing from our room. Reservations messed up by staff. High pressure sales on their "timeshare system". Property needs TLC and upgrading. Self serve, no staff around the pool offers you anything. if you want a drink, go get it yourself. High expectations and tremendously disapointing experience.

This hotel is very different. I would say be very open minded and non judgmental when booking this hotel because the things you will see is EXTRAORDINARY compared to other hotels. I didn't drink, even though it was all inclusive, but I probably would have enjoyed myself more with some drinks in my system. I think this hotel is more for the older generation seeking to live young, wild, and free. It was definitely not for me, but I can check the experience off my list. There were several reviews about the food, but we highly enjoyed the food. I was only disappointed in my fact I there were no real authentic Mexican food. Javier, a server during breakfast, was wonderful! Again, my opinion and I am very picky eater, but the food was really good. Our room was okay, nothing special. I

Great Adults only Hotel. I can't say enough good things about the resort. Fun place with a constant party. Rooms and beds are nice and comfortable. A/C works great, and staff goes above and beyond to make sure your vacation is amazing. Don't hesitate to book this place if you are looking for an awesome party. Adults only

Very good all inclusive resort (rooms, food, bars, service,  etc). Very good parties. But some nights it was over quite early. The thing is that there are mostly couples. I came with another single friend and we barely met single girls. So if you're not into "lifestyle", it can be a problem...

We just got back. Had a great time. The staff and employees are as caring and personal as ever. The guests are sometimes a little over the top but if you can handle the little stuff , it is no big deal. I'm 72, my wife ( well lets just say she is 18 +++.) The steps are a challenge, but you are going to find that at most Cancun hotels. especially the older ones. The food is nothing to get too excited about. Breakfast is still the best meal of the day for us. The drinks are ok. Feel like they are cutting corners as much as possible. JJ and his entertainment team has cut down on team members , at least on our week. JJ is out there mostly at the sexy pool around the 3 pm show. Then he lets the rest of the entertainment team carry on. He and his team are still the best. The boob

This was our first time at a party resort and we definitely had fun! We only stayed for 3 nights, but 2 would’ve been better. The party vibe is all day and all night. Theme nights were fun. We needed a few days to recover from our vacation! However, the food was terrible. The buffet was the worst we’ve ever seen and we’ve been to Mexico 18 times prior. The service was good. The drinks were watered down. We knew the “lifestyle” would be there, but we didn’t meet one person who wasn’t in it. That being said, everyone was very nice and didn’t bother us after we said no. The rooms are soooo small! When we arrived our air conditioner was broken. They came to fix it right away, but it never got cool. We were sweating in the room the whole time. There is a lot of storage to hang your

Our butlers, Ivan and Lefranc took excellent care of us and timely resolved any problems that we encountered.  Without them, our stay would have been rated much lower as Management of Temptation has done a poor job of retaining great employees both as Play Makers and servers.  We are long term members and almost all the employees that we met during our stay were new and had only been at the resort a short time.  In addition, the premium liquor that we have always gotten as members was not available forcing us to buy the liquor that we drink offsite and provide to bartenders to make us drinks.  Very poor service for an expensive All-inclusive resort.

We are Premier members and have been to the Desire properties for 14 amazing trips. We're now adding the sister resort, Temptation Cancun to our rotation!  Gloria with Premier welcomed us with her wonderful smile and made us feel right at home. She had the amazing butler Richie there to greet us promptly and made sure we had all the dinner reservations we wanted, as well as room service scheduled. We were offered an upgrade from Bash Oceanview to Lush Oceanfront for a reasonable price and we're so glad we did it. We had a very special afternoon using the jacuzzi on the balcony!  The Playmakers and all the bartenders made the Sexy pool so much fun. As members and Tower occupants, we absolutely loved having lunch at Sky 3.5 with Liz. She is so sweet and a pleasure to talk to.  And

Temptations (TTR) has always been great because of the atomsphere and the People. Its the people we meet at TTR that always brings us back. I honestly encourge couples to go but to NOT buy into or purchase the Premier Timeshare pitch.   Every year has been geat but this was the first year we did not attend because we had no reason to go. At check-in Premier provided with a document stating we had a credit of $780 to use throughout our stay at the resort (which we kept and have a proof). At Checkout Luis (the supervisor) and Renee (checkin receptionist) did not honor this and we were not able to use not one dollar of the credit to out stay. Luis refused to correct the issue even thought we had the document stating that we had credit from checking into the resort that TTR

Had an amazing time as per usual. I brought my mom for the first time and she enjoyed meeting all the people that make the resort awesome - including but not limited to - our butler Christian, Dehlia, Kevin, Giselle, Lili, Juanita, Ricky Ricardo,  Luis, pretty boy, Ale, Beto, Sebas, Will, Guido and sexy papi. Thank you so much to everyone!

This was my second time at this resort and I have to say Temptation is an incredible place to visit that will allow you to experience things you've likely never experienced. The entire staff is excellent at making the experience even better for everyone. Joaquin and Guido in particular are truly special at their jobs. If you are considering going here you should know ahead of time that it will be an experience you will never forget.

Gabriel (Waiter) at the buffet is the BEST! Oskar (security) is AMAZING!  The food a all the restaurants are subpar but the service is amazing! The evening parties are late.  They NEED an elevator for handicap individuals!

I must say every time we come to Temptation it’s always a great time, especially the staff, everyone was great.  Joaquin Sanchez Montero really had the party going and went above and beyond to make sure everyone had a great time and introduced himself to all the guests  at the resort.  Also want to say thank you to Gabriela Gutierrez and Isaac Garita for always checking up on us and making sure we were taken care at the resort.  And special thanks to Edil and Max who were security for always going above and beyond and making sure the guests are safe.  The one negative I can say is nighttime manager JOSUE, he was extremely rude and condescending and made our last night unpleasant, and many guest that have visited this resort have said the same thing about him.  Despite how our

As usual, Temptation does not disappoint.  We had wonderful time, lots of daytime activities.  The bar staff is great, and the Playmakers always try to make sure you're having fun.   Theme nights for 2023 were ok, and prefer that they select themes that people can easily shop for.   We always choose the Plush Jacuzzi for our room, and this year did the Plus Jacuzzi Playful Experience.   While we enjoyed some of the perks that come with the upcharge, we didn't think we got the value from it... some might.   We did try the spa for the first time in 6 trips.  Well worth the pampering.      Restaurants are great, and our favorite is Sutra.  Shout out to Jones who was our server.  He is the best, and make sure to ask for him. He'll take care of you!
